reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and suitable for events, offering good value for money. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it's perfect, others mention the large size runs a bit snug. The color and fabric quality also get mixed reviews, with some praising the material while others find it not up to par. The build quality is similarly divided between those who say it's well made and those who find it poorly constructed. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits as expected
items.body: Beautiful and fits perfectly. No alterations needed. Fabric is of great quality. Read more
items.author: K.T.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s absolutely a great dress and I would buy this brand again!
items.body: Good quality and beautiful on! I am 5’3 and it is past my ankles like a long formal. Of course I will wear 2” heels and my shoes will show some. Doesn’t need to be altered at all! I bought a 2X and weigh around 171. I will wear a high waist tummy control to look slimmer. I recommend this formal for any type of occasion such as a prom, or wedding guest!! Love it and it’s very comfy!!!! I unzipped down about 4 inches and pulled over my head then I was able to zip it up carefully…. I bought the Peacock color and goes great with my blonde hair!!!! Read more
items.author: Ann R.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty but runs a size smaller
items.body: This dress is super pretty. The sparkles add just the right touch. I ordered a 2XL and the band around the waist is really snug. I would probably be more comfortable if it was 3XL so I feel like it runs a size small. Read more
items.author: Amy K

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase, not the best quality
items.body: Good dress. Length is good for petite. The look is not as sharp and good as in the picture, but it works. It look inexpensive. Read more
items.author: AZ shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Split Formal Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Split Formal Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Navy, Lavender, White, Blush, Burgundy, Grey Blue, Peacock Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
